ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Class Balance
ygData.msgSnippet: ok i didn t know that, but i don t think that s the case with this guy.  i don t think he s ever done anything but outside stuff, and i bet he started his
ygData.messageBody:
ok i didn't know that, but i don't think that's the case with this guy. i
don't think he's ever done anything but outside stuff, and i bet he started
his druid after harmony started working, which has to have been quite a
while ago if not at the beginning of the game. i would be surprised if he
has ever grouped or been inside a dungeon =) i can't complain, i got caught
last night myself, when my guildmate handed me a sky stone after landing him
in nek, and i had to cancel since i hadn't bought the sky/hate gates yet (ok
i have them now!) =p

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L48 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> Note: For the longest time, Harmony did absolutely nothing and was
> worthless at a spell. I bought it because I am a completist and I
> wanted everything. At some time, they did a "silent de-nerf" and
> made Harmony more than do something -- but actually be WORTH
> using. It is possible, if he doesn't read the net, this druid
> tried Harmony/heard from like levels that it was worthless and
> thus never actually bought it... and has not been doing outside
> stuff with groups since that someone mentioned "Hey, Harmony
> -works- now"
